title: Add protocol reference mapping and validation collateral
body:
## Summary
- rewrite the protocol reference mapping report with per-phase dependency tables and supporting-doc analysis
- refresh the renumbering adjustment prompt to match the proposed numbering scheme and highlight missing handoffs
- add a validation script outline and a risk assessment to guide automated and manual checks during renumbering

## Testing
- not run
